nodes.text: Star Wars Kids 5 is the fifth issue of Star Wars Kids magazine. It was published by Scholastic and released in January 1998. Issue 5 included part five of the serial comic The Rebel Thief, written by Ryder Windham.

Star Wars Kids 5 was available exclusively to subscribers of Scholastic's Star Wars Missions young-reader series and roleplaying game, which arrived as monthly continuity packages via direct mail. Each package included a new Star Wars Kids magazine issue and the latest Star Wars Missions adventure book. Star Wars Kids 5 came packaged with the game's fifth adventure book, The Hunt for Han Solo.
